Reviews.Title: “Best Value in the Area”
Reviews.Author: surfcitygirl
Reviews.Content: We've stayed at the Hololani three times in three different units and were never disappointed. The Hololani is on the ocean and about half way between Kapalua and Lahaina. Lot's of restaurants are within walking distance, though, if you don't feel like having to get in the car and drive up or down the island for dinner. As I mentioned, these condos are ocean front with breathtaking views but the beach itself is small. You only have to walk a short distance along the beach, though, to find a better beach. These are all individually owned condos and some are more updated than others. We've stayed in 203A, 603B and 804B. All were nicely updated and well equiped. Bldg. B is the best one to be in if you want shade on your lanai/balcony. Bldg A has the sun shining on it basically all day. These units are not air conditioned but all are equipted with ceiling fans/and or standing fans. If you go between October and May, you won't even notice it as there are great cross breezes through the condos. The resort is a bit only so there's no spacious lobby with all the glitz but it's a very friendly place to stay. They have a great pool with three nice barbeques and best of all, there is free underground parking! All the units are around 1200 sq. ft with two bedrooms and two baths, and the balconies are huge, which is what makes this place such a great value! We've enjoyed ourselves every time and will keep going back!

Reviews.Title: “Christmas In Maui”
Reviews.Author: Bansheemama1
Reviews.Content: We stayed in untit B-504 for 13 days over Christmas 2011. From the moment we walked in we felt at home. It was tastefully decorated and very comfortable. We had everything needed to cook an amazing Christmas dinner for 8. My husband cooked almost every night on the grills by the pool. (They were of commercial quality) We were also impressed with the up keep of the pool area. Every morning we watched them sanitize all the chairs and clean the pool. The beach in front of the condo is not the best for families with small kids but we seen plenty of families playing in the sand. We loved it because it was not crowed at all. We took long walks in the morning and then just relaxed in the sun for most of our days. What I liked best about this place is the views from the lanias (we had 2 because we stayed on an end unit) we spent most of evenings watching the whales and the turtles playing in front of the condos. But be aware that there is noise from the waves crashing on the beach that comes with having a condo this close to the water. We got used to it after a couple of days.U This is a very low key environment perfect for a layed back vacation away from all the people at the big resorts.

Reviews.Title: “Sounded like a freight train!”
Reviews.Author: TAC613
Reviews.Content: If you like sleeping next to a freight train, then by all means book your stay at the Hololani! Between the wind and the street noise, sleep was impossible. We actually left after one night and went to a real resort. That being said, the view of the ocean from the 8th floor was great and the room decor was new and it was clean. They desperately need to upgrade the windows however! The beach is nonexistent and it is NOT a kid friendly location. If you are looking for fun pools and a great beach that is steps away from your room, this is NOT the location for you. We were very disappointed!

Reviews.Title: “A great, relaxing "home base" for a family vacation - A301”
Reviews.Author: Sunshine1984
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful time at the Hololani back in March, 2011. We flew in the same day as the earthquake and tsunami in Japan, but everything was operating normally at the resort by the time we arrived. If you're looking for a fancy resort-like atmosphere with lots of activity and noise, this wouldn't be the place for you, but we much prefer quiet and laid-back accommodations, so this was the perfect place for us! Our room (A301) was gorgeous, with granite countertops, new living room furniture, great appliances, comfortable bedding, etc. The front bedroom was wonderful, with a sliding glass door that we left open all night to hear the ocean, while the back bedroom was HUGE and had a comfy king bed. We were able to watch whales right from our lanai, and also saw giant sea turtles right down the steps by the beach. If I had to name one drawback, that would be that there wasn't much of a beach right in front of our resort, but since we rarely stayed at our condo during the day and instead were doing activities off-site, this wasn't a problem for us. It was also handy to be able to quickly walk to nearby shopping and food, including a convenience store, Senor Frogs for snorkeling equipment, a coffee shop, etc. I would definitely stay at this resort again.

Reviews.Title: “quiet, convenient location”
Reviews.Author: calinative
Reviews.Content: We stayed in unit B404 and when we arrived it was like a dream come true. From the outside the place isn't fancy at all, but this unit has been completely redone. It feels like you could live there and the views from the balcony and bedroom were unreal! You can see turtles all day from the balcony. I loved how peaceful and quiet this area is but close enough to the shopping and restaurants of whaler's village and downtown lahaina. Will definitely be back, would be awesome for whale watching.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful getaway without the expensive costs!”
Reviews.Author: lakeside83
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Hololani with 2 young kids for one week. The condos are right on the beach with great views. Stay in the B building and stay in a unit ending in 04. These units are feet from the beach and have better all around views. They also dont have afternoon sun beating in the room. Great pool and beautiful landscaping. Only downfall is there is no AC, which isnt great for small kids with noon naps. The breeze keeps it cool in afternoon and evening though. No front desk or helpful activities desk because its not a hotel but rather individual owned condos. Overall, well worth the money and time spent, we will be back!

Reviews.Title: “Great NW Maui condo”
Reviews.Author: DGM054
Reviews.Content: This property is visibly older but is maintained beautifully and is very clean. There is no a/c but we never had a real problem with that. For the price I would return anytime!

Reviews.Title: “Recommended for peace, quiet, and beauty”
Reviews.Author: WCO6
Reviews.Content: We stayed B403 in June of 2011. The unit is very family friendly with 2 bedrooms and 2 baths. The floor plan is such that screens can be opened to get a cross breeze morning, afternoon, or night. We've stayed in condos before and found this one to be very nicely equipped. There are four large soft beach towels and every type of glass, plate, kitchen utensil, tupperware, serving ware, and kabob skewers. There are three gas grills by the pool that are easy to use, so either purchase meat at the Safeway in Lahaina or the Thai grocery up the road and grill out. The Lanai is very quiet and faces Molokai. The unit gets almost no noise from the road so you can listen to the waves. It's true that there's little to no beach, but that should not be a problem. One can drive to the beach (the Big Black Rock and Kapalua Bay have great snorkeling) easily to have fun with the kids. This is a very quiet condo resort. There are not loud children or teenagers blasting about. The rules from the HOA are pretty strict, but we brought our 2 children and have found the peace and quiet to be great. The office has very brief hours during the day (they are closed past 3:00PM) so if you are arriving late do let Marcia know. There's not free internet per se, but as with most of the world you can find free wifi by opening your browser. I'd return to this location in a heart beat!

Reviews.Title: “Nice rooms but facility not kid friendly and no beach”
Reviews.Author: crzyfun
Reviews.Content: The room was very nice and had been updated with granite countertops and had nice furnishings. The large deck was nice with ocean view. It depends on your taste but we found the grounds to be rather depressing. The pool is acceptable but not kid friendly. For instance, the rules are posted, which include items such as "no playing games such "marko polo". The beach has eroded away, leaving only sand bags. If you are wanting a lush Hawaiian experience this is not the place to go; however, if you do not have children and want a nice condo to stay where you do not mind driving to a beach, this is an acceptable location. The photos we've seen on the internet of the beach at Honolani Resort are outdated as of April 2011.

Reviews.Title: “Alittle piece of heaven”
Reviews.Author: chick45
Reviews.Content: We have been coming to the Hololani for 30yrs and Absolutly love it! The beach may have sand bags on it to prevent erosion but that is up away from the water and there is ample room for couples with children to walk and play in the water. The beach is beautiful in the evenings with the fabulous sunset. The Hololoani is kept up and the grounds are beautiful. Our children are adults and now bring thier kids to the Hololani. They enjoy the freedom of the pool and the grounds. Thank you for such a lovely place to stay. My Grandkids thank you too

Reviews.Title: “Good location and quality”
Reviews.Author: SLMcMill
Reviews.Content: We just spent 8 nights at Hololani - it is a part of our Vacation Internationale timeshare. We stayed in A803 and enjoyed it very much. Excellent ocean views and sunsets. The only downsides to Hololani are: the master bedroom is an extension of the living area, so no real quiet place for the baby to nap during the day, the second bedroom faces a noisy street and there was not a yard with sunchairs for resting with an ocean view, the only sunchairs were restricted to the pool area which is shaded for most of the day (at least in December). But overall, we've stayed here before and will likely stay again - Maui is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it”
Reviews.Author: nornie73
Reviews.Content: We stayed 7 nights in until A101, with our two young children and grandma. We really enjoyed our stay. The view was magnificent and our condo had everything we needed. We enjoyed BBQ'ing most nights and eating on our lanai. Dan, the manager, was very friendly and present, and you knew he took pride in managing the Hololani. They provide a supply of boogie boards and beach toys you can borrow. Our kids enjoyed swimming in the pool (keep in mind most of the guests there were over 60 and I wouldn't say overly kid-friendly--we had to remind our kids often to stay quiet in the pool area), and watching for turtles on the beach. The beach is not great, but there are so many nice beaches not too far away. There was a small shopping center close-by that you could walk to (not too much there, but a quick walk). I drove to Safeway in Lahaina for groceries before I realized there was a much larger, cheaper store called The Times (I think), just a couple of miles down the road. All in all, a nice, relaxing stay and we would come again (probably when our kids are older).

Reviews.Title: “A relaxing place in paradise”
Reviews.Author: Lovetovacationanytim
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Hololani resort in unit A204 and it was fabulous. We rented this unit through [--] and the price was very reasonable. The view from this corner unit is nothing but spectacular. The resort is located in Kahana and accessible to so much on the west side of Maui. The pool area is small but adequate and the entire property is very clean and well appointed. Our unit was nicely decorated and had everything you could want in the kitchen. Beach chairs, mats, umbrellas and towels are in the unit and the carpeted lanai in this unit has wonderful, comfortable furniture. There is also a parking spot that goes w/the rental and that is a must in this area! There is also high speed internet available in the unit. There are 2 BRs in these condos and they are spacious. The front bedroom only has a louvered door to the living area and the back bedroom has a pocket door. I would say that is the only drawback to the entire place. The front BR has a fabulous view but you are right there on the water and it can be loud at night if you have the patio doors open. We loved it!! . The back bedroom has a nice view as well and it is a bit quieter. Lots of wonderful beaches nearby and fabulous restaurants very close. Our favorite dinner spot was Merrimans and it is just down the road from Hololani on the water-expensive but worth it and an absolutely beautiful place to watch the sunset! We can't wait to go back to Maui and we will stay in this same unit at Hololani!

Reviews.Title: “WOW!!! - Absolutely a magnificent view and accomodation.”
Reviews.Author: fishcaptain
Reviews.Content: Owner redesign and upgrades make this Hololani B 604 unit most unique. Furnished with beauty and style. Anything available you might need. Design of balcony making it a part of living room is a designers dream and a ocean watcher paradise. Will stay here again and have already recommended B604 to many of our friends. Have spent over 30 years visiting this area of Maui at excellent hotels and condos. None exceed this one for confort, view or value.

Reviews.Title: “Would stay here again in a hearbeat”
Reviews.Author: VancouverLL
Reviews.Content: We were booked into A-304; this unit is a gem; has been upgraded significantly and nothing is lacking, all the amenities and fixtures are first rate; great bed in master, vey comfortable. The view from the lanai is fantastic and the location of the complex is close to anything we cared to go and see

Reviews.Title: “WHAT AN AMAZING AND SPIRITUAL PLACE”
Reviews.Author: kapakahi
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed at the Hololani Resort and rented condo # B604. The resort sits right on the beach in Kahana Maui and was walking distance to shops shops and restaurants. The condo we rented was beautiful and the furniture seemed to be new. It had a full kitchen with granite counter tops and it even had a washer & dryer so we could wash our beach & pool clothes. The best part of staying here however was the view....wow! It was so beautiful it was like watching a movie. We had a great time swimming, paddle boarding and relaxing. We even saw a Hawaiian Monk seal which I have heard is very rare! I would definitely recommend this condo to a friend and already have. We booked our spot for next year through their website... www.onthebeachmaui.com

Reviews.Title: “Worst Beach on Maui”
Reviews.Author: yamanote
Reviews.Content: Hololani is a condo building facing west on Maui's west coast at Kahana. The sunsets from here are in incredible from every unit. However the property is marred by its horrible beach. It appears there is beach erosion so to prevent any further erosion (and perhaps damage to the building) giant sand bags and plastic netting has been laid down on the beach. Every beach on West Maui is spectacular, and its a shame this beach is so poor. I am not an expert and can't say why beach erosion occurs, but its possible the condo is too close to the shoreline. The pictures on the web site do not show the current condition of the beach. I have posted some photos taken Jan 24 2010 thats shows the current condition. All is not lost - a little further south is a nice wide sandy beach. But if beach is the objective, then best to go to another resort location on West Maui.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous stay!”
Reviews.Author: brovan
Reviews.Content: We are staying at the Hololani in A601 as we speak. Unfortunately this is our last day here! We have been here for 13 days & it was exactly what we were looking for. We found this through the VRBO website & rented directly through Donna the owner who has been fabulous to deal with! The condo itself was decorated a little bit more our style-modern/contemporary with touches of tropical throughout. Many other condos I looked at was the typical tropical with tons of wicker. The condo has a huge lanai with breathtaking views of the ocean. Everything was very clean & tidy when we came in. It has a washer & dryer which was a life saver with 2 kids! We were able to have most meals in which saved us a ton & much easier than dragging a tired 6 & 2 year old to places to eat everyday. The condo resort itself is smaller & very quiet which is what we were looking for-really wanted to get away from it all. There are only around 60 condos total. It is immaculate & very well kept up. The pool is on the small size, but there were never more than a couple kids in it at a time & we spend a lot of time there! Always space available to just lounge by the pool which overlooks the beach & ocean. The resort sits on Kahana Beach which was great for the kids-very gentle waves. There is a reef out further so the waves tend to break far from shore & stay gentle. I thought Kahana was in a great location as it was quiet, but close to places to eat & shopping if that's what you wanted. It was also within 5-10 minutes of some other great beaches if you wanted to try them out. Also only 10-15 minutes to Lahaina which we drove into a few times. I would highly recommend this place. Oh & did I mention the whales-amazing! They were out in front of this place all the time and I'm not exaggerating! We can't wait to come back again! We are in love with this place!

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed A404 however...”
Reviews.Author: bambam775
Reviews.Content: While we enjoyed this unit & the overall location of the property, there are a few things that I would like to mention for those who will stay here in the future. Do not expect someone to come in mid-week and clean or offer fresh linens. The road noise from 1 of the bedrooms is terrible as this property is located on a main road. We had to deal with the sounds of morning traffic, garbage trucks and the like beginning quite early in the AM. Don't come here looking for privacy as the doors to the rooms are not solid pocket doors. The screens into the 2nd bedroom are not kind of see through but not sound proof. The only thing I would change anything about the unit itself is to get rid of those screens. A wall would do nicely there! Otherwise the unit is very comfortable & has high quality appliances. The pool is very nicely located right next to the beach & was always clean. The beach is literally right in front of you. Just walk a few steps away from the building & there you are! That was great. If you're looking for the sounds of the ocean...this is the place to stay! Great views from the lanai...we got to whale watch! We would not stay in this unit again but would stay on the property.

Reviews.Title: “What A Place”
Reviews.Author: Aussie_Troy
Reviews.Content: This was our first trip to Hawaii. We traveled with our three young children and my parents. We booked B404 and B504 for six nights and were very happy with both the units chosen and the resort. The units were clean, comfortable and nicely furnished, but for me it was the oceanfront view that would bring me back. The pool and grounds were in excellent condition and the outdoor BBQ's were well used by all. We had the option at the time of booking of the A or B building, however I am happy we chose B as the afternoon sun did appear to impact the A building.

Reviews.Title: “Hololani was the best!”
Reviews.Author: TravelBug0817
Reviews.Content: We my husband and another couple stayed in A402 this past week. Let me just say it was an excellent stay. This is our third time staying in Maui, in prior years we've stayed at Papakea and Valley Isle - while the other locations are reasonable and have good views, they pale in comparison to the Hololani. The condo is a great size and is tastefully decorated. Just by checking out the other lanais we noticed that our furniture was by far the best. The kitchen has everything you need. Both bedrooms and bathrooms are a good size. The only -- small -- complaint is that the front room (with the amazing ocean view and sounds) doesn't have drawers so you'll have to put your clothes in the side end tables. (A few small price to pay.) I can't wait to stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “It was better when we first arrived then startd slipping a little.”
Reviews.Author: shirken3
Reviews.Content: We arrived this past Saturday, Memorial weekend and are still here as I write this review. If I were writing this review when we first arived I would give it 5 stars because it is beautifully furnished, granite countertops in kitchen and bathrooms. Bedrooms are spacious as are the dinning area and kitchen. The view is spectacular. Can't beat it! But after staying here for 4 days so far it has slipped to 3 stars. We are in unit 601. The negatives are the road noise, people noise and work crew noise. They are installing new railings in all the units and they are drilling and hammering all day long right next to us. Luckily our unit was done before we arrived or we wouldn't even be able to enjoy our view. As for the road noise, any unit ending with 01 (101, 201, 301, 401, etc) is farthest from the beach and closest to the road with cars passing by all day and night. We had a hard time getting to sleep the first night from all the cars passing by. We were lookiing forward to being lulled asleep by the ocean not passing cars. I don't think the units closer to the ocean heard the cars. So look for units ending in 03 or 04. As for the people noise, either the walls are thin or some people are noisy. I think the way the resort is situated people's voices echo and sound really loud at times. Also apparently some people were partying a little to much by the pool during the day (we were gone to Haleakala and missed the action) and for some reason the police were called in the evening to one of the units. 3 police cars arrived and after some loud conversation the people noise got pretty quiet. We're pretty easy going people so all in all we are having a great time. We have three more days at the Hololani so I will finish my review once I get home.

Reviews.Title: “Condo A104, Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhh”
Reviews.Author: goaway5
Reviews.Content: Very beautifully decorated and has all you need except food and beverage. I prefer a quieter area with a great view and Hololani in Kahana fit the bill. This condo is an end unit with very little foot traffic for privacy. Even tho it is on the ground floor, it is raised up so that you do not miss a thing. The view is outstanding, one of the best on Maui I think. Professionally cleaned with lots of towels, hot water, beach towels, beach chairs, toys, hats and so much more. Love the washer and dryer. I travel alot to Maui, so will not mention all there is to do, see other reviews, so I go for tru R&R. No airconditioning, but you will not miss it. The sun shines into the condo in the late afternoons, however the sunshade on the patio, keeps it cool enough to stay on the patio. You can see thru it, so you do not miss a thing. On one really hot day, I took one of the portable fans with me out on the lanai and it was perfect. To save money, I prepared all my meals in the wonderful kitchen with a great view. I appreciate the assigned parking and containers for recyclables in the underground lot. Also free wifi. I like working directly with the property owner, Sherrie. I have stayed at several of her other condos and have always been pleasantly suprised at how much nicer they are than I expected. (and I expect alot!) Website for this condo is www.vrbo.com/29207. Check it out, the photos do not do it justice. Its a great value, especially compared to just a hotel room on the beach. You don't get much closer to the beach in this condo. Enjoy the whales (in season) turtles swimming by, snorkeling, exceptional view.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely condo, incredible views!”
Reviews.Author: HappySail0r
Reviews.Content: Hololani B-804 is a beautifully decorated condo with amazing views from all living areas. We enjoyed being lulled to sleep from the sound of the surf and the island breezes kept the unit from ever being too warm. It was a very relaxing and enjoyable place to stay. The heated pool felt great on a cool windy morning and there is a nice beach to walk. There were several snorkelers and lots of turtles in the bay, although we never made it out to snorkle there. The whale watching and the sunsets are magnificent! It is an easy walk to a number of restaurants and shops. Mike, the manager and Marcia at the front desk were both very helpful and friendly. We enjoyed our stay very much and hope to stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “what a nice time”
Reviews.Author: teninoguys
Reviews.Content: We stayed in B402, this time usually staying in A 704. But had a wonderful time. Room was clean and very classy. Staff was great. But the best part was watching the whales from our private deck overlooking the pool. Children are welcome, but mostly quiet adults so hearing the waves 50 feet away is incredable. Easy walking distance to stores, but so quiet you are truly in paridise. We will return again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice!!!”
Reviews.Author: gousfbulls99
Reviews.Content: We stayed in unit B404. It was a nice remodeled unit. It was well stocked. The large sliding glass doors have been replaced. In this unit, one of the bedrooms does not have a door and all the other bathroom/bedroom doors are closet type doors with louvers. This is good for airflow, but bad for privacy and noise. You can really hear the ocean waves at night which may be good or bad depending if you are a light sleeper. The office and cleaning staff seemed top notch and were helpful when needed. The view was great! The pool was very well maintained and heated. The beach was ok, but not the type of beach you want to spend a lot of time on. Overall, I would stay here again. A little more privacy in the bedrooms is the only upgrade this unit needs.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place to stay”
Reviews.Author: dancemom37
Reviews.Content: We were nervous about booking a condo through VRBO but it was great. The condo was up to date and very well maintained. It was plenty big enough for the 4 adults that went on this trip. The pool area was small but there was hardly anyone there so we never had a problem getting a lounge chair. We grilled out a few times at the poolside barbecue. The only downfall was not having free internet in the room. Going down to the rec room area wasn't convenient. We would definitely stay there again and would recommend it to others. We stayed in A204. The view was amazing!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Affordable Ocean Front condo”
Reviews.Author: BKKDoug
Reviews.Content: We are a family of four that includes two teenage boys. We stayed here in April, 2008 for one week in unit B204, a corner unit and found it to be perfect. The condo was very clean, had updated furnishings and was on the ocean. Ocean front views out of both the living area and the master bedrooom. Beach in front of condo isn't very big and we didn't use it as it was too small and not really good for swimming. We spent most of the days going to different beaches, surfing, snorkeling and touring around the Island. The condo was the perfect place to come back to re-group, relax and watch the sunsets. Location is a 10 minute drive to Kannapali and another 5 minutes or so to Lahaina. Grounds were clean and the Pool area although small was very nice with a couple of BBQ's available. Only downside was was lack of internet in the room. They have wireless available but only in the lobby area so you have to walk down and sit at a few tables set up to access the internet. Would have been much better to have internet in the room so you could sit on the Lanai and sip Mai Tai's while doing emails. As a family we all agreed we would stay here again and in fact we are already looking towards next April for our next trip..

Reviews.Title: “Great Accomodations and Locations”
Reviews.Author: sixtysomething
Reviews.Content: We stayed in unit B-204 from May 10th to 17th. We couldn't believe the awesome views when we opened the door. The condo exceeded our expectations. We could'nt of asked for a nicer place to stay on our 1st trip to Maui. It was so nice and clean and welcoming. It was so relaxing to just to sit out on the lanai and watch the sunsets and ocean. The pool was nice for swimming and they had grills to cook on. They kept the grounds,the pool and grills cleaned everyday. The Hololani mangement was so nice. There were good eating places nearby. The beach was good for walking and our condo was oceanfront. There was no air conditiioning but you didn't need it. It was great just having the ceiling fans going, the winds blowing thru and the sounds of the ocean. The condo had everything you needed. If we return to Maui again we will definitely stay at the Hololani.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely stay at the Hololani 4-18 thru 4-27”
Reviews.Author: MrsAgent
Reviews.Content: We stayed in unit A-601 which we rented through VRBO. It was a beautiful unit and well-maintained with many updates. Our view of the ocean was wonderful, and we saw quite a few whales. As another person mentioned, part of the pool deck is under construction - the result of a nasty storm last winter. However, this wasn't an inconvenience at all. There was still plenty of room. Kahana beach is not a great beach when compared to the many other beaches on Maui. However, you can swim there, and there were a few snorkelers, though I doubt they saw much. There is not enough beach to lay out on, but we always drove to other beaches anyway. Not a big deal. While we rented directly through the condo owner, I wouldn't hesitate to rent through Hololani management. From what we could tell, they do their best to keep the property well-maintained and clean. Our interactions with staff were always pleasant. These condos are nice, clean, quiet, and have a great view! I would definitely rent there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location!”
Reviews.Author: khut
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Hololani Resort from March 29 through April 5. We had a wonderful stay. It is right on the water and great views from the lanai. We stayed in unit A-702. The unit istself was clean and comfortable. It could use some updating, but nothing that is absolutely necessary. Part of the pool deck was closed due to work being done on it. The pool itself was open and there was room for lounging around the pool. The only inconvenience was accessing the beach. Instead of being able to walk through the pool area, we had to walk around it. There are three barbeques that are available for the guest. The pool and the barbeques were cleaned every morning. The unit does not air conditioning, which wasnâ€™t a problem because of the ceiling fans and the trade winds. The worst night was our first because it was closed up before we arrived. Beach towels were provided. The unit was well equipped. Parking was great and it was a short walk to a small general store, McDonalds, Outback Steakhouse, Maui Brewing and another restaurant whose name escapes me. The beach isnâ€™t that great or large, but was walk able. We did swim a little in it, but there were many rocks in the surf. Our favorite part was the view! We had beautiful sunsets between Lanai and Molokai every night. We also saw many whales from the lanai. This is a wonderful place to stay and would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Construction in front of Hololani during feb 2007 (and longer?)”
Reviews.Author: orangelollypops
Reviews.Content: My sister is at the Hololani now and is pleased with their ground floor accomodations. I just wanted to let everybody know that if anybody is planning a vacation in the immediate future, that the oceanfront is all torn up. We stayed next door at the Pohailani and up to when we left on Feb 19 it was still quite a mess at the Hololani. The grounds on the ocean side were all torn up, grass removed, pool under renovation, and rocks in front of the property. This doesn't affect your view if you are high up, but it didn't look so nice from the ground. My sister lost half her lawn space in front of her lanai. Make sure you ask the condo owner when this will be fixed if this matters to you. Otherwise, it's a great spot and the beach is much better than people say it is. Lots of sand and no seaweed. Quite a few big rocks right in front of Hololani but we walked passed them and sat in front of the Valley Isle, right next door.

Reviews.Title: “Great place and good location”
Reviews.Author: keevygz
Reviews.Content: Our family of five spent Christmas 2006 here and loved it. The pool was warm and lovely. The barbecue area was always clean and nicely kept. We always saw the maintenance man around cleaning and the grounds were well kept. Wow - the ocean waves were sooooo loud at night we had to keep the door sliding door closed. We stayed in unit A502 and rented directly from the owner on the [-] website and saved some money renting directly from him. Our older kids could have used a gym and we could have rented from the Valley Isle gym next door but decided to use the great outdoors instead and save some money. I would highly recommend staying here and renting our unit to save some money. Why am I sharing this because now my unit might not be available! The lady at the front desk was so helpful with places to eat. We can't wait to go back!

Reviews.Title: “Great sandy beach location”
Reviews.Author: perrotcamper
Reviews.Content: Comfortable accomodations for 4 -6 adults. The manager was very friendly and helpful. The pool area was very nice and a great place to relax after our daily activities. Our room was on the 7th floor, each apartment overlooks the ocean beach and the island of Molokai-a picture post-card scene every day. Three gas grills poolside, so meals were convenient to prepare.

Reviews.Title: “Hololani is great!!!”
Reviews.Author: anglovesmaui
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a 10 day stay in Maui at the Hololani. We stayed in unit A203 and it was wonderful. The staff is very friendly and easy to work with. The condo was ready when we arrived and felt like home. We had four adults staying in the one unit and did not feel crowded in the least. There was plenty of room to hang our clothes and lots of drawer space. The kitchen was fully equipped and had dishwasher detergent, dish soap, towels, aluminum foil, cookware, you name it! There was also a coffee grinder. We bought ground coffee at Costco, but if we get to go again, I'll remember this so we can grind our own. The condo also came with beach towels, had I known this I would not have packed my own, but they are there (at least in this unit) if you need them. The grounds were nicely maintained. The staff cleans the pool and the pool area every morning, and the grills are cleaned daily as well. We ate out for the majority of the trip, but we saw other residents using them and the pool area has tables so you can dine al fresco. The units are not air conditioned!!! This was not a problem for us as the trade winds and the fans in the condo kept us cool enough that we really barely noticed. However, I know this can be an issue for some people so please be aware that none of the condos have a/c at this time. The beach is really not a good swimming beach, but great for taking a stroll. There was a lot of high surf for the majority of our trip (this affected all beach areas, not just the area where Hololani is located), but the water is a little rough and the water area is pretty rocky (under the water). The pool was lovely for swimming and relaxing when we weren't out exploring. They do like for the pool area to be relatively quiet, so you may want to keep this in mind if you feel like partying it up! The condos are located in a very convenient area and I think look to be nicer than some of the other condos in the same location. It is right around the corner from some very good restaurants, including a brew house & rotisserie that makes nice local microbrews. It is a short drive to both Kapalua and Lahaina as well. We loved that the location was so convenient and still felt secluded. We had a very late flight off of the island (11 pm!) and asked to be allowed to stay in the unit past our check out time. The staff was very accommodating and had no problem letting us check out later. If you need to do this, it is nice to check in advance to make sure no one is checking into your unit right after you leave. The views are really unmatched in this complex. I stayed in a hotel on my first visit to Maui and to get the view we had at the Hololani, we would have to pay about a thousand bucks a night. In this unit, we were literally less than a hundred yards from the beach. I can only imagine what it is like during the winter when the whales come. It's just breathtaking, and you can see both Lanai and Molokai. Unreal. There were only two things that bothered us a bit during our stay: 1) they started working on the outside of the pool area during our last few days, and we saw a few nails on the walkway on the way out of the pool. Not good for bare feet or flimsy flip-flops! and 2) the sound of the ocean. I know that sounds like a ridiculous complaint, but the surf is LOUD. It's not an issue during the day, but if you are a light sleeper, it can wreak havoc on you, and it did for me. I did not sleep through the night once in the whole 10 days we stayed. We finally got desparate and closed our sliders one night but got too hot and had to reopen them. It was not enough that I would not stay here again, because I certainly would, but I will bring some sort of sleeping pill with me next time! I would recommend that anyone stay here! Mahalo Hololani!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Accomodations and Location”
Reviews.Author: TheHelpfuls
Reviews.Content: Unit #204 at the Hololani Resort is wonderful. We would stay there again without hesitation. We prefer 4 star accomodations when traveling and this exceeded our expectations. The unit is well decorated, has a full kitchen, large living room and two full baths. You won't believe how close this end unit is to the ocean. You have to turn your TV volume up to hear it over the sound of the ocean. You are convienently located between Lahaina and Napili, which makes everything convienent. Stay her unless you require the onsite facilities of a resort hotel - bar, large pool (small one on site), large beach onsite, etc.

Reviews.Title: “Full ocean view...Gorgeous decor...Perfect!”
Reviews.Author: NancyJones
Reviews.Content: As we stepped through the door into 402-A, our adult daughter's first words were, "Way to go, Mom!" Thanks to Trip Advisor, we really had found a winner! Unit 402-A is absolutely beautiful!! This recently remodeled condo has everything... granite counter tops, mirrored walls, tiled floors, all part of a warm, very tasteful tropical decor. An ocean view through floor to ceiling windows spans the entire length of the living room and front bedroom. Everything we needed was available from coffee filters, baggies and cookie sheets to a DVD player...We also had access to BBQs and a large room for private parties. Really, other than our food, we lacked nothing to make our stay comfortable. The incredible part of all of this is that our accommodations were far more inviting and luxurious than what we saw when visiting family staying in a high-end time share up the street. I want to give you the full picture of Hololani Resort. It is a comparatively small condo, a little older than those nearby. The elevator is badly in need of new carpeting and a fresh coat of paint. i can't imagine that all of the units are as nice as 402-A as each owner decorates to his taste and budget, but we heard only positive remarks from other guests. The pool is small but well maintained. In the evening, the area is aglow with tiki torches, easily enjoyed from our lanai. Marcia in the office is very helpful. I asked her to select the best unit for our needs. She certainly did a great job with that! Upon departure, I left our camera battery plugged into the wall. She immediately mailed it back to me which I very much appreciated. Lots of restaurants are within walking distance. There are three supermarkets within a ten minute drive. Expect to pay more for groceries. (In one store, Bing cherries were $12.95 a pound!) We found the best prices at Safeway and were glad we had shopped first at Costco, near the airport. You will need to take your own salt and pepper as all cndiments are removed from the condos between stays. Bottom line...When we return to Maui one day, we will definitely stay at Hololani Resort!

Reviews.Title: “our August 2006 visit to Hololani Resort in Kahana Maui , north of Lahaina”
Reviews.Author: ilovegoogle
Reviews.Content: My family of 3 and my sister spent 5 days at Hololani in early Aug 2006 In general, we enjoyed our stay at the property. The Hololani condos are located in Kahana which about 15-20 mins north of Lahaina and 5 minutes south of Kapalua. About 1 block away on Hoohui street, there's all the stores you need to make your vacation enjoyable. There's a Whalers' general store which is basically convenient store similar to ABC store. In the same shopping center is a McDonald's, Roy's ( yes, the famous chain restaurant from Oahu), Outback Steak House, local coffee hangout and a local micro brewery. In addition, you can get all our watersport needs at the Maui Dive shop. As an added plus, there's a decent Chinese restaurant hidden on the same street about 1.5 blocks away called China boat. So if you are craving chinese food, this is the place. You don't need to drive 15-20 minutes to Lahaina The Hololani condos have two twin towers 8 stories high; the buildings are probably built from the early to mid 1970s The condos are literally on the beach. If you are a light sleeper and can't stand to listen to the waves , then this place is not for you. Also if you open the front door to your unit, you'll get the wonderful cross wind to cool the condo. The breeze was great and comforting. During our stay building B was being reneuvated so it was a little bit noisy with the constructing, but nothing worth losing sleep or complaining about. Looking at some of the units from the pool, the CC&Rs for this condo is lax, because some units have fans installed in the lanai, others don't/ We stayed in unit A303. The unit was in good condition; the bathroom fixtures needed to be replaced and updated though. One of the towel racks was coming apart too. The pool is small but good size. The beach adjacent to the property is narrow and has sharp rocks, but it's still romantic for sunsets or early mornings. our 11 month old son enjoyed the beach. The BBQ grills are easy to use When we arrived, we were given lots of good tips in Maui tour books. Marcia, the property manager was helpful in our trip to Hana; she let us borrow an audio CD of the road to Hana. There were some guests who has some noisy kids but they quieted down as soon as someone asked them to chill out. One thing I would change is to make it a house rules for non smoking certain hours by the pool. I have an infant and several times we left because there were guests who were smoking. Would I stay here again? probably, but I am curious about staying in other towns like Kaanapili , Kapalua or Kihei. So it's most likely I would go to other place. With that being said, this place is a great value for families needing 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, assigned parking, walking distance to food stores, and as close as you can get with a view of the beach and ocean Thinking about owning a condo in Hololani - one unit on the 6th floor as asking for $980k for 2bd, 2ba and 770 square feet.

Reviews.Title: “Great condo complex”
Reviews.Author: Jellybeanz
Reviews.Content: Myself, my DH and our teenage daughter stayed here for a week, June 30-July 7. We absolutlely loved this place and the condo we stayed in. It was beautifully decorated, clean and very well kept, the grounds were lovely and well maintained and the pool/bbq area was nice. The kitchen was well supplied. The stackable washer and dryer were very handy to have in the condo. We really liked the fact that it is a smaller complex, we really felt like we were at "home". The beach is in fact a "wet" beach, but it wasn't that big of a deal since right next to it, there is a very nice stretch to walk on or lay on. It was wonderful to go to sleep to the sound of the waves and to wake up to the sound of the waves. We will definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “peaceful”
Reviews.Author: kellie-jo
Reviews.Content: Just spent 10 days in A-104 [--]kahanaoasis[--] ( photo) It is a very nice and quiet condo, NO BEACH that was the only bummer, But the pool was great very uncrouded nice grills nice location and assigned parking beautiful view and sunset.

Reviews.Title: “A Great Place to Stay in West Maui”
Reviews.Author: Fan-of-Maui
Reviews.Content: Our family of five stayed at the Hololani for about a week in February and thoroughly enjoyed our time there. Our suite was larger than we expected and was clean and recently renovated. The beds were comfortable and the kitchen was well-equipped. We particularly enjoyed the availability of barbeques by the pool. The grounds and the pool are very well maintained. The views of the ocean, with Lanai and Molokai clearly visible are absolutely breathtaking. When we visited in February, we could easily see whales just offshore and were awed by their fantastic breaches. There was not a wide beach right at this location, although there was some sand and enough length for a short walk. I would recommend you rent a car and simply drive to the many beaches in Maui - some of the best are within 5 to 10 minutes of the unit. We particularly enjoyed the snorkelling at Kapalua Bay (5 minutes north). Here's a tip - don't immediately go out and purchase boogie boards etc. for your visit - check with the hotel manager - often people leave their boogie boards and other equipment behind at the hotel - these are made available for your use!

Reviews.Title: “Great Deal”
Reviews.Author: DiabloDeb
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Hololani from Dec. 27, 2005 through Jan. 4, 2006 - What a great place to spend New Years or any other day of the year. Our unit was B-204, it was very clean, we had everything we needed in the kitchen and even utensils for the BBQs. Tons of dishes so we didn't have to run the dishwasher all the time. It was nice, peaceful, relaxing and quiet. The other guests and the staff were very friendly. There are a set of small steps that lead right down to the beach. Our unit had a closet full of beach toys and chairs that I assume they had accumulated from other visitors not wanting to pack them and take home. We had great views of both Lanai and Molokai from both balconies (lanais). The grounds are beautiful full of all sorts of tropical flowers, even cute little banana trees. The surf was usually heavy at night and was a great thing to listen to falling asleep or just relaxing out on the lanai. We never saw any dolphins swim by during our stay but we did see an occassional sea turtle and many whales. Just across the quiet street is a little convenience store, gas station, some good restaurants and shops. If we return to Maui, I would definately stay at Hololani again. The prices are great, the rooms are perfect, everything was just like a post card even the sunsets every night.

Reviews.Title: “Couldn't ask for More”
Reviews.Author: mauibabe
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 10 days in B-204. From the moment we stepped inside, we knew we had made the right choice. We had a double-end unit, so the master bedroom had a gorgeous ocean front lanai as well. The condo was very tastefully decorated and gives a great island feel. Everything was so clean and updated as well. The sunsets were awesome,the rainbows were breath-taking, & the pods of dolphin swimming by were wonderful to watch. The grounds are beautiful and well-kept.We loved sitting on the lanai in the evenings and watching the flickering tiki torches that lined the grounds along the beach. We hated to leave. We have already booked another 10 days for May 2006. Can't wait to return. We've stayed at other condos, but nothing compares with the Hololani for us. The rental manager went out of her way to make sure that we had everything we could wish for.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place!”
Reviews.Author: Arlo89
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Hololani (room A602) last week, and we loved it. As everyone else has said, all the rooms face the ocean, and a beautiful balcony runs the length of the unit. Our particular unit had been upgraded, and we had granite countertops throughout and new appliances. The beach in front isn't great for snorkeling, but it's perfect for the kids because it had smaller waves. Our two children (ages 7 and 10) loved going down there to play, and they also enjoyed the pool area. There's a barbecue area by the pool, and we made use of the grills several times. A pod of dolphins swam by one day, and the views of Lanai and Molokai are oustanding. The building is very quiet, and the beds were comfortable. Our unit had lots of nice amenities including a blender, toaster oven, hair dryer, and beach towels. Probably the only drawback we found was a lack of hot water and low water pressure in the showers. We would usually go snorkeling at Kapalua, which is only 10 minutes away at most, and it was about a 15 minute drive to Lahaina. Our stay there was perfect, and we were sad to leave.

Reviews.Title: “Hidden Gem”
Reviews.Author: Julauf
Reviews.Content: The Hololani is absolutely worth the price. We stayed in one of the end units and had a view of the ocean from our bedroom and a view from our living room and second bedroom. We took our kids who were almost 4 and almost 2 and they had a blast. The swimming pool area is beautiful and is gated (I appreciate this safety feature). The beach in front of the property is perfect for morning or evening strolls. We drive up to Kapalua beach for snorkeling. Inside the condo everything is updated, clean and roomy. The 2 bathrooms are both full size. We felt absolutely spoiled to be staying here. We will be going back in about 6 weeks. We have stayed at Napili Point (not worth the price) and the Noelani (inexpensive but dated and we had electrical problems in the bedroom of our unit) and will continue coming back to Hololani until it goes out of our price range.

Reviews.Title: “THE BEST”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Great location, within walking distance to mini mart and stores. 5 minute drive to great snorkeling. Loved it. VERY clean, roomy and awesome view. Great ammenities like assigned parking, pool, bbq and the beach right there. Absolutely loved it. Great price too. I paid $205 for a 2 bd/2bath. Split with another family, couldnt beat that deal. I will always stay there when I visit Maui.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome!!!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed in unit 202. Great condo, great location right on the beach. The beach here is wet, great for walks but not sun bathing. Napili beach (highly recommended) is only 5 minute drive. Shopping/Restaurants are in walking distance from condo. Room looked exactly like the virtual tours. Highly recommended! Can't wait to get back to this one.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Condo!”
Reviews.Author: Patty O
Reviews.Content: We had a 9 day stay at the Hololani and it was fabulous. The staff is friendly and helpful. Our fifth floor condo was stocked with everything we needed, exceptionally clean. It was perfect for two couples with two bedrooms and two baths. Large lanai with an exceptional view. The pool was clean and refreshing. The beach was the only downer with lots of sea weed. If you want to sit on the beach, take a child's plastic rake for the seaweed. We've stayed in several condos on Maui and this one so far has been the best for the money. A great deal!

Reviews.Title: “Hololani - Bring da kids!”
Reviews.Author: tcaruso768
Reviews.Content: This is a lovely , older, smaller, property, beachfront that caters to families and also has some timeshare units in it - no worries on the presentation - there isn't one (thank you!) It is clean, the prperty managers are very nice and the views are wonderful of the sea and other islands. Close to the Whaler Shopping center and Roy's and Outback Steakhouse, as well as a decent short drive into Lahaina and all the sights of Maui. We enjoyed meeting the people who stayed here - a good mix of travellers. The beach is right there and you can walk for about a quarter mile before it ends with rocks. Just enough beach for a short jog or a morning stroll! The one thing that is not a complaint, but just the way it is...we didn't like the 2nd bedroom. THe sliding glass door directly opens to the walkway to the other units. I wouldn't be all that comfortable at night keeping it open for a nice breeze. It had several locks on it at different positions, but still not something we thought was a bonus. All in all, this is a clean, enjoyable AFFORDABLE family connection that needs to be bookmarked for future visits!

Reviews.Title: “Whales, Whales, Whales”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed here the week of March 15, 2004. We were in our spacious room for about 10 minutes when the first whale had been spotted by my husband from our lanai. It was so exciting! We could see the spray from their blowhole, tails and fins, etc. Bring your binnoculars for a closer look. The management is very accomodating and the Hololani was perfect. We could stroll on the beach just outside the property and the family had a great time snorkeling with some turtles. We have stayed in other condos and none were as spacious as the Hololani. The view, sunsets are spectacular and the trade winds kept us cool and comfortable. We will return.

Reviews.Title: “Heaven”
Reviews.Author: geoh808
Reviews.Content: We are leaving for a 2 week stay at the Hololani at the end of April. Each stay is always the same whether a year passes or five years. The Hololani is an exuisitely kept condominium resort---don't expect resort hotel services--that provides a perfect feeling of privacy and comfort in the Kahana area. Two high-rise buildings form an "L" facing the beach and a breathtaking view of Lanai and Molokai. All units run through the building providing constant and access to the trades. After at least 10 years of staying at the Hololani, we define Maui as heaven at the Hololani. The units are clean and spacious and well appointed. As in earlier reviews the restaurants and stores are but a step away, but within the Hololani it is still a separate and wonderful place apart. Couples and families alike will love the place. We had dinner at a Roy's in San Diego the other night and felt the old Kahana feeling. Booked the flight the next day. Hololani, Slaughterhouse, Fishbowl and Roy's Kahana await!

Reviews.Title: “A Little Slice of Heaven”
Reviews.Author: Lindyc01
Reviews.Content: Hololani means heaven and it reflects the name. We have stayed there twice in the last three years and will return again. Office staff was always helpful. All units are ocean view (some would consider them all ocean front) and are fully equipped with everything you need. Pretty lawn, nice pool and BBQ grills complete the area next to the beach. There is a convenience store, Mickey D's, Internet Cafe and four nice restaurants within 1 1/2 blocks. Try the Fish and Game Brewing Company. They brew their own beer. The "Blond Bikini" was great.

HotelInfo.Name: Hololani Resort
HotelInfo.Address: 4401 Lower Honoapiilani Rd, Lahaina, Maui, HI 96761
